title: Traveling will affect my playing time
body: Not sure if this is the right board, but basically Ill be moving to china for 6 months and would still like to play league. Do i have to switch servers? or can i stay in my NA server? or am I shiz outta luck?

replies.body: This one really isn't a question for Riot, but probably more for your ISP that you will be using in China. I know they're heavily locked down so chances are you won't be able to connect to the NA servers  - you'll probably need to use the Garena server unfortunately.
excuse my lack of knowledge, but a Garena server? is that something i have to switch to, like pay for?

Garena hosts the League servers for South East Asia. Tencent hosts the League servers for China. Like Eambo stated, you cannot transfer to these servers unfortunately. You can still play on the NA servers, but since you will be playing from China you may have a degraded experience.

> [{quoted}](name=Digital Ram,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=kAekcQA9,comment-id=000000000001,timestamp=2015-01-07T00:23:03.859+0000)
>
> Garena hosts the League servers for South East Asia. Tencent hosts the League servers for China. Like Eambo stated, you cannot transfer to these servers unfortunately. You can still play on the NA servers, but since you will be playing from China you may have a degraded experience.

Thanks for clarifying Digital - sorry for the misinformation before everyone, I wasn't 100% on who hosted what :-P

> [{quoted}](name=ZennKip,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=kAekcQA9,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-01-06T19:47:22.302+0000)
>
> excuse my lack of knowledge, but a Garena server? is that something i have to switch to, like pay for?

Garena are the company that host the LoL Chinese servers. I don't think there's any way to transfer from NA to Garena unfortunately - when they first opened that server they manually moved people who wished to move, then went off and did their own thing from there.

I may be incorrect, but this is my understanding of it at least.

> [{quoted}](name=Eambo,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=kAekcQA9,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-01-06T20:04:42.824+0000)
>
> Garena are the company that host the LoL Chinese servers. I don't think there's any way to transfer from NA to Garena unfortunately - when they first opened that server they manually moved people who wished to move, then went off and did their own thing from there.
> 
> I may be incorrect, but this is my understanding of it at least.

That's correct! They will maybe sometimes once a year open up a change to transfer there. But only for a short window of time and if you miss it, you miss it q-q
